body: Then you should support his work where there's no scat. When there's more sale on no scat work, he's going to notice that people support him on nonscat work than scat work, and he's going to draw more nonscat work
This author has some interesting CFNM and CMNF stories for sale, and at one point I genuinely considered buying some to support him, but I'm not going to give my money to a dude that draws scat lol.
